lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.mavenfile.internal
Class DefaultMavenFileSerializer

java.lang.Object
  lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.mavenfile.internal.DefaultMavenFileSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MavenFileSerializer
public class DefaultMavenFileSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MavenFileSerializer

Default implementation of the MavenFileSerializer interface. This implementation is instanciated per-lookup.
